name: Report
description: The Report interface of the Reporting API represents a single report.Reports can be accessed in a number of ways:Via the ReportingObserver.takeRecords() method — this returns all reports in an observer's report queue, and then empties the queue.Via the reports parameter of the callback function passed into the ReportingObserver() constructor upon creation of a new observer instance. This contains the list of reports currently contained in the observer's report queue.By sending requests to the endpoints defined via the Report-To HTTP header.

refs.name: Reporting API
refs.description: The definition of 'Report' in the 'Reporting API' specification.
